prompt: For how many years has the US women's national soccer team been ranked in the top 3 of FIFA rankings?
orig_response: As of October 2023, the US women's national soccer team has been ranked in the top 3 of the FIFA rankings for over 20 years, consistently maintaining a position among the elite teams in women's soccer since the rankings were first introduced in 2003. Their sustained success, including multiple World Cup victories and Olympic medals, has solidified their status as one of the premier teams in the sport, contributing to their long-standing presence in the top tier of the rankings.
